parameters.name: Cycle
parameters.description: The cycle based on which queries are performed.

parameters.name: Locale
parameters.description:
The identifier of the language.

Valid values:

*   EN: English.
*   ZH: Chinese.

parameters.name: ModuleCode
parameters.description: The code of the pricing module.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: PayMode
parameters.description: The payment mode. Valid values: total: all upfront. half: half upfront. zero: no upfront.

parameters.name: SpnType
parameters.description: The type of the savings plan. Valid values: ecs: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) compute type. universal: general-purpose type.
